info.name: Bandcamp - Collection Shrink
info.description: Shrinks the size of displayed albums in a fans collection. This is achieved by scaling down and/or hiding elements, the option's yours.
info.additionalInfo:
2.4 Removed, target 'domain(bandcamp.com)'
2.3 Fixed, '@-moz-document rules' to improve compatibility with 'Stylus'.
2.3 Removed, 'Play Button Background' option.
2.2 Fixed, 'Fan Bio Photo' being partially covered by header when 'Fan Banner' is hidden.
2.2 Fixed, 'Item Container' size to better fit 'Item Art'.
2.1 Fixed, 'Supported by' not showing in the 'feed' after opting to hide 'Appears in # Collections'.
